EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Enter email for the tenant's security admin user. An email will be sent with a link for setting a new password. Make sure SMTP is set (under "Settings"  ).

403.EMAIL_SERVICE_DISABLED: You cannot create a new tenant while SMTP is disabled
403.DEFAULT: You do not have permissions to create tenants

ADD_TENANT.405: Failed to create a new tenant. The maximum number of tenants is reached. An existing tenant should be deleted first before creating a new one.
ADD_TENANT.409: See details next to fields above
ADD_TENANT.503: Total available capacity was not defined yet, please try again later

DELETE_TENANT.403: You do not have permissions to delete this tenant.
DELETE_TENANT.404: The tenant you tried to delete no longer exists. It was probably deleted from another session.
DELETE_TENANT.409: Tenant deletion already initiated (probably from another session).
DELETE_TENANT.DEFAULT: Unknown error occurred while attempting to delete this tenant.

ERROR_MSG.QUOTA: Must be an integer number between 1 and {{ quotaMaxGb }}

UPDATE_TENANT.403: You do not have permissions to update this tenant.
UPDATE_TENANT.409: Tenant is currently in non-stable state and cannot be updated. Please try again later.
UPDATE_TENANT.503: Total available capacity was not defined yet, please try again later
UPDATE_TENANT.DEFAULT: An unknown error occurred while updating the tenant.

ERROR_MSG.UPDATE_TENANT_TITLE: There has been an error with updating the title

MUST_CONTAIN_MSG: Must contain 1 to 31 letters, digits and underscores, without space. Must start with a letter.
NAME_DESCRIPTION: Must contain 1 to 31 alphanumeric characters, digits and underscores, without space. Must start with a letter.
TENANT_DELETION: To confirm the tenant deletion, enter its name (case sensitive):
TENANT_DELETION_WARNING: Tenant "{{tenantName}}" is not empty. If it is deleted, all of its data will be lost!

TOOLTIP.CONTAINERS_COULD_NOT_BE_BROWSED: Containers of this tenant could not be browsed by users via UI unless a proper web gateway is set.
TOOLTIP.ENABLE_BUTTON: To enable this button, enter the tenant name in the text box.
TOOLTIP.TENANT_NAME_DOES_NOT_MATCH: The specified tenant name does not match the selected tenant.
